channel.title: Need a good place to put my server
channel.description:
I'm sorry if this is in the wrong section, I couldn't think of where to put it. I am making A server an am getting help from someone as well. I am wanting to put the server on a webclient. Since it's way easier than downloading a client. I need a good way to put it on a website and I would love for it to have forums. I'm not interested in spending a lot of money but please give me free options and places I would have to pay. I want a lot of traffic so please help.
I also have another question. How should I set up a paypal donation thing for he sever o the website. Thanks for reading, tyler

God your gay too. Let’s use A smiley face

item.description:

[quote=“Shadowspkin, post:4, topic:401794”][quote author=ibarageu link=topic=498853.msg3648010#msg3648010 date=1309532666]
I asked for help and opinions from other rsps owners. Not a douche response. Thanks
[/quote]

It’s called telling you were to look

Anyways ill suggest Edge as everyone else does ;)[/quote]
haha, lol. He didn’t asked where to put his home. He asked if we know a good place to set up his webclient for free and how to set up his paypal
